title: CYBERCZAR, U2 Songs Mean Stuff? 11.4.19
itunes:title: CYBERCZAR, U2 Songs Mean Stuff? 11.4.19
description:
In episode 508, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian and Corporate star Adam Lustick to discuss a Portuguese McDonald's making an offensive sundae joke, the majority of women wanting to impeach Trump, Republicans support for impeachment of Trump slowly rising, more Rudy Giuliani nonsense, an Aunt Becky update, My Decade TV, Blizzcon 2019, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. McDonald’s Portugal apologizes for sundae promotion, poor grasp of history
  2. MAJORITY OF WOMEN AND COLLEGE-EDUCATED WHITES SUPPORT IMPEACHING AND REMOVING TRUMP: POLL
  3. REPUBLICAN SUPPORT FOR TRUMP'S IMPEACHMENT RISES TO 18 PERCENT, POLL SHOWS
  4. Rudy Had a Secret Meeting With Zelensky’s Rival, Too
  5. Rudy Giuliani needed Apple genius help to unlock his iPhone after being named Trump cybersecurity adviser
  6. Lori Loughlin To Fight New College Bribery Scheme Charges; Facing 50 Years In Prison, Trial Set For 2020 – Update
  7. Vintage TV emulator whisks us back to a time when everything we watched looked like garbage
  8. In his opening statement for #BlizzCon2019, Blizzard Entertainment president J. Allen Brack spoke to the company’s decision to suspend @blitzchunghs, saying "we have failed in our purpose."
  9. Protestors Rally Outside Blizzcon 2019 with ‘Winnie the Pooh’ Costumes
  10. WATCH: Smeyeul - Relaks

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
